text: Tara pichata sihamte ka’le, ‘he amara raba! Amara bhramanara duratba dirgha karai diya’. Sihamte nijarae prati an'yaya karaichila. Phalata ami sihamtaka kahinira bisaya bastuta parainata karailo arau sihamtaka sampurnaraupe chinna-bicchinna karai dilo. Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, pratyeka dhairyasila, krtajna byaktira babe
